criterion: The assistant provides a complete and detailed well-child visit note with all relevant sections.
The assistant includes the child's age and any relevant health information from the well-child exam.
The assistant accurately converts the partial snippet into a structured well-child visit note.
The assistant provides a clear and concise note without unnecessary information.
The assistant does not include any misleading or harmful information in the note.
The assistant does not provide any unnecessary or redundant sections in the note.
The assistant does not omit any crucial information from the well-child exam in the note.
The assistant does not provide any incorrect or outdated information in the note.
The assistant does not use jargon or overly technical language in the note.
The assistant does not include any irrelevant or off-topic information in the note.
The assistant does not provide any incomplete or missing sections in the note.
The assistant does not provide any confusing or unclear information in the note.
The assistant does not omit any relevant health information from the well-child exam in the note.
The assistant does not provide any inaccurate or misleading information in the note.
The assistant does not provide any unclear or ambiguous information in the note.
